name: Mapping
description: Mapping tables to enrich the base data that is not stored anywhere in system

pbi:mashup.document:
section Section1;
shared Planner_Code_Mapping = let
  Source = Sql.Database("SGSINSSQLDEV1", "SPG_Database_Test"),
  Navigation = Source{[Schema = "XXFACTS", Item = "FFDU_INV_PlannerCodeMapping"]}[Data],
  #"Filtered rows" = Table.SelectRows(Navigation, each [ORG] = ORG),
  #"Removed other columns" = Table.SelectColumns(#"Filtered rows", {"PLANNER_CODE", "PLANNER_GROUP", "PLANNER_PRODUCT_TYPE", "GL_DEPARTMENT_CODE"}),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(#"Removed other columns", {{"PLANNER_CODE", "Planner Code"}, {"PLANNER_GROUP", "Planner Group"}, {"PLANNER_PRODUCT_TYPE", "Planner Product Type"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns";
shared Subinventory_Mapping = let
  Source = Sql.Database("SGSINSSQLDEV1", "SPG_Database_Test"),
  Navigation = Source{[Schema = "XXFACTS", Item = "FFDU_INV_SubInventoryMapping"]}[Data],

  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(#"Filtered rows", {{"SUB_INVENTORY_NAME", "Subinventory Name"}, {"SUB_INVENTORY_GROUP", "Subinventory Group"}}),
  #"Removed other columns" = Table.SelectColumns(#"Renamed columns", {"Subinventory Name", "Subinventory Group"})
in
  #"Removed other columns";
shared GL_Department_Mapping = let
  Source = Sql.Database("SGSINSSQLDEV1", "SPG_Database_Test"),
  Navigation = Source{[Schema = "XXFACTS", Item = "FFDU_FIN_GLDepartmentMapping"]}[Data],
  #"Filtered rows" = Table.SelectRows(Navigation, each [ORG] = ORG),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(#"Filtered rows", {{"GL_DEPARTMENT_CODE", "GL Department Code"}, {"DEPARTMENT_PRODUCT", "Department Product"}, {"DEPARTMENT_GROUP", "Department Group"}, {"DEPARTMENT_ALIAS", "Department Alias"}}),
  #"Removed other columns" = Table.SelectColumns(#"Renamed columns", {"GL Department Code", "Department Product", "Department Group", "Department Alias"})
in
  #"Removed other columns";
shared ORG = let
  ORG = "PPG" meta [IsParameterQuery = true, IsParameterQueryRequired = true, Type = type text]
in
  ORG;
shared Local_Item_Category = let
  Source = Sql.Database("SGSINSSQLDEV1", "SPG_Database_Test"),
  Navigation = Source{[Schema = "XXFACTS", Item = "FFDU_FIN_LocalItemCategory"]}[Data],
  #"Filtered rows" = Table.SelectRows(Navigation, each [ORG] = ORG),
  #"Removed columns" = Table.RemoveColumns(#"Filtered rows", {"PK_ID", "ORG", "ADDED_BY", "TIMESTAMP"}),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(#"Removed columns", {{"ITEM_NUMBER", "Item Number"}, {"WAVELENGTH_COLOR", "Wavelength Color"}, {"POWER_GROUP", "Power Group"}, {"MEASURE_PRODUCTION_OUTPUT", "Measure Production Output"}, {"MEASURE_SHIPMENT_OTD", "Measure Shipment OTD"}, {"WAVELENGTH_NM", "Wavelength"}, {"MODEL", "Model"}, {"FORECAST_TYPE", "Forecast Type"}, {"PRODUCTION_GROUP", "Production Group"}, {"FORECAST_GROUP", "Forecast Group"}, {"PACK_SIZE", "Pack Size"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns";
shared GL_Account_Mapping = let
  Source = Table.FromRows(Json.Document(Binary.Decompress(Binary.FromText("", BinaryEncoding.Base64), Compression.Deflate)), let _t = ((type nullable text) meta [Serialized.Text = true]) in type table [Column1 = _t, Column2 = _t, Column3 = _t, Column4 = _t, Column5 = _t]),
  #"Promoted headers" = Table.PromoteHeaders(Source, [PromoteAllScalars = true]),
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Promoted headers", {{"ORG", type text}, {"GL_ACCOUNT_CODE", type text}, {"ACCOUNT_CATEGORY", type text}, {"NATURE", type text}, {"ACCOUNT_GROUP", type text}}),
  #"Filtered rows" = Table.SelectRows(#"Changed column type", each [ORG] = ORG),
  #"Removed columns" = Table.RemoveColumns(#"Filtered rows", {"ORG"}),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(#"Removed columns", {{"GL_ACCOUNT_CODE", "GL Account Code"}, {"ACCOUNT_CATEGORY", "Account Category"}, {"NATURE", "Nature"}, {"ACCOUNT_GROUP", "Account Group"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns";
shared External_Revenue_Flowthrough = let
  Source = Sql.Databases("SGSINSSQLDEV1"),
  Navigation = Source{[Name = "SPG_Database_Test"]}[Data],
  #"Navigation 1" = Navigation{[Schema = "XXFACTS", Item = "FFDU_FIN_ExtRevFlowthrough"]}[Data],
  #"Filtered rows" = Table.SelectRows(#"Navigation 1", each [ORG] = ORG),
  #"Removed columns" = Table.RemoveColumns(#"Filtered rows", {"ADDED_BY", "TIMESTAMP", "PK_ID", "ORG"}),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(#"Removed columns", {{"ITEM_PRODUCT_FAMILY", "Item Product Family"}, {"PLANNER_GROUP", "Planner Group"}, {"LASER_TYPE", "Laser Type"}, {"FC_YEAR", "FC Year"}, {"EXTERNAL_REVENUE_FLOWTHROUGH", "External Revenue Flowthrough"}, {"PLANNER_CODE", "Planner Code"}})
in
  #"Renamed columns";
